Class Program

java.lang.Object
Program
public class Program extends Object
This class corresponds to the main program. It allows interaction between the user and the database. The purpose of this program is to allow the user to access the database and perform predefined queries.

INF201 : Java project

Author:
loladenet

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args)
      This method runs the main menu allowing the user to enter the program.
      Parameters:
      args - : list of string arguments

    • openConnectionAndExecute

      public static void openConnectionAndExecute​(DataBase db)
      This method opens the connection to the database, adds the parameters to the query and executes it.
      Parameters:
      db - : DataBase object

    • chooseQuery

      public static Query chooseQuery()
      This method proposes queries and allows you to choose the parameters.
      Returns:
      Query : Returns the selected query with the parameters.

    • createNewConnection

      public static void createNewConnection()
      This method allows you to create a new connection by choosing the url, the user and his connection password.

    • showMenu

      public static void showMenu()
      This method only allows the display of the main menu.

    • integerInput

      public static int integerInput()
      This method allows you to retrieve the keyboard input of integers.
      Returns:
      Integer : returns the integer entered by the user.

    • stringInput

      public static String stringInput()
      This method allows you to retrieve the keyboard input of strings.
      Returns:
      String : returns the string entered by the user.
